title: Refreshing Training!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Goooooal!! Aah, Ai is so tired~!! That was hard, Kanan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>No no no, people who really think that it’s hard can’t cool down that fast.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>This plan really pushes you, though, so if you don’t cool down properly, you’ll have a bad time later.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Well, that’s true. I’ll help you stretch your body. Give me your hands.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Thank you. Hnnn~~~, that feels good! But man, you guys really made a brutal training plan, Kanan. So this is the hell triathlon, huh~. Ai totally gets why Kasukasu was crying now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>She was? Well, I guess I did something terrible to her.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>No, no, she was crying, but she was proud that she did it. You know, does everyone in Aqours do these kinds of amazing stuff all the time? Well, Ai thought that you guys must have done a ton of practice from watching your dances, but....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>We do, but it’s not like it’s easy for all of us either. Yoshiko-chan has been complaining a lot recently during the triathlon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai thinks it’s actually amazing how she can complain while doing this, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Huh? Ah, I see.... Maybe I should raise the level for Aqours a little bit more!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
